title: Exploring Neural Mechanisms of Inverted Learning: Experimental Cognitive Task-Based Project at Scale

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic cognitive science and neuroscience concepts, fundamental experimental design principles
context.additional_context: Team-based flipped learning experiment design and data analysis using digital devices

learning_goals: Implement the two subprocesses of backward learning (stimulus-reinforcement association formation and emotional transition) via experimental tasks.
Explain the functional roles of brain regions (e.g., dorsolateral prefrontal cortex, orbitofrontal cortex) within the context of backward learning.
Collect and analyze backward learning experimental data through team-based projects and visualize the results.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
